name: Capital Ring link to Brentford station

ai.summary: A short 1.3 km easy urban segment of the Capital Ring starting near Brentford Station in west London. This flat, low-effort walk combines parkland, canal paths and light street sections for a quick outdoor break.
ai.terrain_summary: Predominantly flat and easy underfoot, with paved sidewalks, park paths and a canal towpath. Expect occasional curb crossings and urban surroundings; some sections may be on grass or gravel near parks.
ai.safety_notes: As an urban walk, stay aware of pedestrians, cyclists and traffic at crossings. Secure valuables, carry a charged phone and map access, and dress for the weather. If walking after dark, ensure good visibility and consider a flashlight or phone torch.
recommended_gear: Phone with charged battery and offline map
Sunscreen and a hat (for sunny days)
ai.best_seasons: Year-round, with spring and summer offering the most daylight and pleasant walking conditions.

seo.title: Capital Ring Brentford Station Segment – 1.3 km Easy London Walk
seo.meta_description: Explore a short 1.3 km section of the Capital Ring from Brentford Station. An easy urban walk through parks and canal paths in London, with safety tips and gear.
seo.h1: Capital Ring Brentford Station Segment – Easy 1.3 km Urban Walk
